progression_balancing.description:
A system that can move progression earlier, to try and prevent the player from getting stuck and bored early.
A lower setting means more getting stuck. A higher setting means less getting stuck.

accessibility.description:
Set rules for reachability of your items/locations.
Locations: ensure everything can be reached and acquired.
Items: ensure all logically relevant items can be acquired.
Minimal: ensure what is needed to reach your goal can be acquired.

priority_locations.description: Prevent these locations from having an unimportant item

goal.description:
Classic Mode: Every Item pickup increases fills a progress bar which gives location checks.

Explore Mode: Each environment will have location checks within each environment.
environments will be locked in the item pool until received.

total_locations.description: Classic Mode: Number of location checks which are added to the Risk of Rain playthrough.

chests_per_stage.description: Explore Mode: The number of chest locations per environment.

shrines_per_stage.description: Explore Mode: The number of shrine locations per environment.

scavengers_per_stage.description: Explore Mode: The number of scavenger locations per environment.

scanner_per_stage.description: Explore Mode: The number of scanners locations per environment.

altars_per_stage.description: Explore Mode: The number of altars locations per environment.

total_revivals.description: Total Percentage of `Dio's Best Friend` item put in the item pool.

start_with_revive.description: Start the game with a `Dio's Best Friend` item.

final_stage_death.description: Death on the final boss stage counts as a win.

begin_with_loop.description:

Only has an effect with Explore Mode.

dlc_sotv.description:

Affects environment availability for Explore Mode.
Adds Void Items into the item pool

death_link.description: When you die, everyone dies. Of course the reverse is true too.

item_pickup_step.description:
Number of items to pick up before an AP Check is completed.
Setting to 1 means every other pickup.
Setting to 2 means every third pickup. So on...

shrine_use_step.description:
Explore Mode:
Number of shrines to use up before an AP Check is completed.
Setting to 1 means every other pickup.
Setting to 2 means every third pickup. So on...

enable_lunar.description: Allows Lunar items in the item pool.

item_weights.description:
Set item_pool_presets to true if you want to use one of these presets.
Preset choices for determining the weights of the item pool.
- New is a test for a potential adjustment to the default weights.
- Uncommon puts a large number of uncommon items in the pool.
- Legendary puts a large number of legendary items in the pool.
- Lunartic makes everything a lunar item.
- Chaos generates the pool completely at random with rarer items having a slight cap to prevent this option being too easy.
- No Scraps removes all scrap items from the item pool.
- Even generates the item pool with every item having an even weight.
- Scraps Only will be only scrap items in the item pool.
- Void makes everything a void item.

item_pool_presets.description: Will use the item weight presets when set to true, otherwise will use the custom set item pool weights.
